data.actual_result: All keyboard input is ignored in the game, Alt+Tab and Ctrl+Alt+Delete is your only way out.
data.expected_result: Once loaded into the game keyboard commands should work, (WASD movement, ESC menu button, other keyboard shortcuts in the game)
data.short_description: Discord Overlay blocks keyboard input on Planetside 2
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure overlay is enabled on discord and for the game Planetside 2. (It is a verified entry) - Upon starting the game the overlay will show its enabled. - Attempt to use ingame keyboard inputs, and find they are not responsive - If overlay is disabled and discord is running keyboard input works normally.
